metadata.title: CVE-2022-24687 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.9.0 through 1.9.14, 1.10.7, and1.11.2 clusters with at least one Ingress Gateway allow a user withservice:write to register a specifically-defined service that can causeConsul servers to panic. Fixed in 1.9.15, 1.10.8, and 1.11.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24687` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.10.12+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.12+dfsg1-1').
